modules.name: DataFetcher
modules.description: Responsible for retrieving stock price data from various sources (e.g., APIs, CSV files). Handles data source configuration and error handling related to data retrieval.
public_api_summary: fetch_data(ticker: str, start_date: str, end_date: str) -> list[dict]

modules.name: Analyzer
modules.description: Performs technical analysis on the fetched stock data. Calculates indicators (e.g., moving averages, RSI, MACD) and identifies potential trading signals.  Handles data validation and error handling during analysis.

modules.name: Visualizer
modules.description: Generates visualizations (e.g., charts, graphs) to represent the stock data and analysis results. Handles different visualization types and output formats.
public_api_summary: plot_stock_price(data: list[dict], title: str, filename: str) -> None
plot_indicator(data: list[float], indicator_name: str, filename: str) -> None
